H0.text: Forbes Magazine named which author as the top earner between July 2012 and August 2013. John Grisham

H1.text: Forbes Magazine named which author as the top earner between July 2012 and August 2013. James Patterson

H2.text: Forbes Magazine named which author as the top earner between July 2012 and August 2013. Stephen King

H3.text: Forbes Magazine named which author as the top earner between July 2012 and August 2013. EL James

A4.text: In 2016, Patterson topped Forbes's list of highest-paid authors for the third consecutive year, with an income of $95 million.

A5.text: In August 2013, James topped the Forbes' list of the highest-earning authors due to her book sales with earnings of US$95 million which included US$5 million for the film rights to Fifty Shades of Grey.
